website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you prefer minimalist designs and want a good deal, considering you get 4 well-made stocking for the price.
pros: Features durable burlap material with wide white faux fur cuffs
cons: Fairly basic looking, but they still feature designs that fit the Christmas season
Some consumers received packs with duplicate designs and wished they were different

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to find these stockings
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to find these stockings! We are a family of 3 with an additonal on the way. Stockings that I have looked at in stores are $8 for one. I paid $9.99 for four! The stockings themselves seem to be good quality but part of the reason I purchased this set is because there were 4 different patterns. When I recieved them I recieved all 4 stockings but 2 of them have tge same pattern. I'm not thrilled, I was expecting them to all be different, but I'll deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Very large, great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of 4 of the red burlap stockings for next Christmas. We have a bunch of mismatched stockings from new grandsons, son in laws, etc. I wanted all matching Christmas stockings to go with my modern farmhouse style. These are cute but not too cutsie or juvenile. The white fur is soft, stocking is roomy and feels well made. They arrived quickly and I’m very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Colors are true as pictured, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bold patterns and for 4 stockings you can't beat the price. They are a pretty thin material but look great as a decor piece. I plan on using them to hold small/light weight stocking stuffers for Christmas morning as well. Each one came packaged in it's own separate bag so if you wanted to separate them as gifts you could and it wouldn't be obvious that it came in a set.
customer_reviews.author: TDalton

customer_reviews.title: So fun to decorate! Perfect size.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: We had great fun decorating these stockings with fabric pens on Christmas Eve! And you can't beat the price! The size is perfect for enough but not too much stuff to have to put in it. For my adult kids, I was able to fit 3 pairs of cute socks, perfume/cologne And lots of little makeup and personal care items.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of four stockings and was shocked to see the price tag on most. I was extremely impressed with the quality of this set for the price. Given that we only use them once a year, I'm very happy with this purchase and I would definitely recommend them for others.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Cute stockings!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for cheap stockings. I bought them for our pets. The material is pretty flimsy and the white sheds on top. But for the price they aren’t bad at all! I added vinyl for our pet names once I revived them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for the price. Kind of in shock. Rarely is a bargain this adorable. Hoping they hold up! The red and blue are perfect for my whimsical decor. Thx Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellinger-Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Hanging from Brick/Maple Fireplace...Better Homes & Gardens
customer_reviews.text: I will upload a picture soon. I have received comments like "That looks like a photo in Better Homes and Gardens." I am in LOVE with everything about these stockings. I used "Glitter Glue" to put a large "first initial" on each stocking.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Boylan

customer_reviews.title: came in as described and as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: for someone like me who changes the color theme every christmas, these stockings turned out to be perfect and pretty for my red/white/peppermint theme.. just perfect for the contemporary look i was going for.. delivery was fast. items were as described and pictured on the vendor’s site.. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These stockings arrived as I suspected. They came folded in a package which unfortunately made them wrinkled. I wanted to iron them, but was unsure of the material to iron. Other than that, they look wonderful above the fire place.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Parson

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These were such a great value. Very fun addition to our Christmas decor. Loved how they looked hung up. We added green glitter vinyl names to fur and it really popped.
customer_reviews.author: busy mama

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the price fool you these are AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality! I was completely blown away when they came and were so well made and big, for the price I wasn’t sure what to expect!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: They were...perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to our Christmas decor. A wonderful start to a new tradition to our young and growing family. Sidenote: the white fur at the top is SOOOOOOOO soft!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the 3 pack/colorful stockings. The fabric is a printed canvas. Honestly, for $5.99 they're WAY better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Family

customer_reviews.title: Not Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they do not expand. They are long but not wide.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAutery

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money - great designs - nice and large also!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design of these Christmas stockings- not your usual 'hokey' designs, plus they're great value for the money! I was surprised and they held a bunch of stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: Terry M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stockings. They are the perfect size , and they feel like they will hold up for a few years. The 4 different designs help distinguish who's is who's. If I ever need new, or more stockings I am definitely buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Full size stockings,  really impressed me!
customer_reviews.text: Single layer burlap, easily ironed out creases. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Koprek

customer_reviews.title: Cute and colorful
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. I love the bright colors. The material is soft but sturdy and will hold a lot of goodies. Great price for four!
customer_reviews.author: S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deal for the price. Not great quality, but is perfect for a Christmas or two.
customer_reviews.author: J_Lz_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these stockings and they worked out perfect for Christmas. They held plenty!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wanca

customer_reviews.title: Stain on burlap
customer_reviews.text: I got the product in and the red and white polka dot had a stain on the back of them . I wanted to return just that one and get a new one but you can’t do that I guess . I really don’t want to reorder the whole set bc they messed up on one ..
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Epley

customer_reviews.title: Cute CHEAP stockings
customer_reviews.text: These are too adorable and are able to hold those stouffers
customer_reviews.author: MauiLady01

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! Great quality!! They will last for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Spadea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Overall they were great! Just a little bigger than I imagined them for our chimney.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Just got these- they appear to be well-made, and though made of burlap they have a cheerful brightness not usually associated with that fabric.
customer_reviews.author: John Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price. :)
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. Well made as far as first impressions go. They haven’t had to stand up to holding any stocking stuffers yet, but overall they seem pretty sturdy and reliable. No complaints here. Good value for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly, nice quality. Bought to customize and put over the fireplace. Turned out beautifully. Also they're pretty good size and were able to hold a lot. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of these stockings! Very nice material and they held up very good for being hung and full of stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.author: Randi sterling

customer_reviews.title: Why I gave a 4 star
customer_reviews.text: They are just like the photo. I love them!!! But one of the strings broke off as soon as I hung them.
customer_reviews.author: Mellow

customer_reviews.title: Cute stockings
customer_reviews.text: Great for such a low price, very soft furry collar and the burlap is actually pretty nice, too. Got them as stockings for our pets, they're adorable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: 6catds

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So cute. Great size and very durable fabric. Needed to be ironed due to being folded in packaging. Would 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: You get MORE than what you paid for!
customer_reviews.text: These are large, sturdy, & adorable. The price on these is fantastic as well! I only wish they came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: RedRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and exactly as described! Super cute and surprisingly amazing quality for the price! They were better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: nichole

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to put names on them for a customer. They turned out beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and well made. The burlap has the added benefit of being able to paint or write names on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. You can tell they are cheaply made but the look can be changed if you’re crafty and add some extra designs!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these stockings and then used vinyl to put our names on them. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love them! They looked great this past Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They looked great this past Christmas! I look forward to using them for many Christmases to come!
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Great stockings
customer_reviews.text: Adorable stocking. Got them professional monogrammed and they look great. Couldnt be happier with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Paige Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't have been cheaper quality! Didn't even take out of the bag. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: jsukow

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of stockings!
customer_reviews.text: Stockings are very nice for the price point. You won't find another set for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect what you ordered.
customer_reviews.text: What?? I had the impressions I was getting the cute, colorful stockings in the picture but they were not anything that me or my kids wanted. No color. Plain burlap. Not worth the time to return them so they will go to goodwill. Thanks! Now I have to find new ones before the weekend for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki & James

customer_reviews.title: Love the blue
customer_reviews.text: Love the blue, red and white to go with my blue and white tree. Arived fast and were great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: The prints are bright and the stockings are sturdy. You can fit quite a bit in each ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. The prints are bright and the stockings are sturdy. You can fit quite a bit in each one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Not assortment shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the look in person versus the picture. Didn’t get the stocking prints shown in the picture which was why they were purchased in the first place, ended up getting two with snowflakes and two reindeer instead of four different ones. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P King

customer_reviews.title: They did great!
customer_reviews.text: My family is growing and our old stockings were, well, old! I honestly did not expect these to be as good as they are. Super cute, durable and fast shipping! I bought vinyl, iron-on names from Etsy and used these this Christmas. I packed them full and they did great!
customer_reviews.author: Adela Waller

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat them for the price and they are well made. Had to get 16...so it was hard to coordinate. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was worried these would be poor quality. Surprisingly they are great. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne B.

customer_reviews.title: and look great hung up
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo cute, and look great hung up. Good quality and I like how all the designs look together!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of stitching
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall look of the stockings. However there are several that the stitching is very loose and I’m afraid if I put to much in them I will have a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Boquist

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: They look exactly like the picture advertised. It was a pain to figure out which fonts and patterns I wanted because you can't view them side by side. I'm happy with the end result though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and at an unbeatable price. Yes you do receive three!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Metzler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, large, and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Omg the quality of these stockings is unbelievable! You want to buy these! Trust me!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Bigger than I expected (I didn't really read the description to learn the size before I ordered). Definitely worth the money that we spent on them
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: I only received 3 stockings...
customer_reviews.text: The photo shows 4 stockings with 4 patterns. I received 3 stockings and 2 of them were the same. Stocking look cute and nice but I am returning since I needed 4 stockings and I wanted them each to be different.
customer_reviews.author: ABaker

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft &Thick!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stockings! Bigger than I excpected. Very nice size! Super soft material, and durable! Very pleased with my purchase :)!
customer_reviews.author: summerose

customer_reviews.title: Affordability+Adorability=Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We loved having these hang on our mantle for Christmas. So affordable and so adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Becksters

customer_reviews.title: In love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! Seriously could not be happier about my purchase, EXACTLY what I was looking for! Very well made, perfect size, and the price can't be beat! Ordering another set to have as a back up, or for if we ever decide to have more kids!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reid

customer_reviews.title: i used them to give out as Christmas presents to my friends (stuffed them with lots of fun goodies). I'll definitely be ordering more
customer_reviews.text: big, colorful, i used them to give out as Christmas presents to my friends (stuffed them with lots of fun goodies). I'll definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Minielou

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love these stockings!! They’re a nice size and the material seems durable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, nice products, will buy again from this company!

customer_reviews.title: Very colorful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my office and everyone loved them. Very sturdy and held a lot of items in them. Would definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: used as party favors for kids and everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.text: so cute. used as party favors for kids and everyone loved them!

customer_reviews.title: Great stockings
customer_reviews.text: Love these stocking. They are perfect for the price and look really nice.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids!
customer_reviews.text: They looked just like the picture. A little stiff but that is the type of material they are made from. Overall, durable and hold a good amount of things. I do love them!
customer_reviews.author: Noelley

customer_reviews.title: Happy holidays
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and great quality. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cathrine Missildine

customer_reviews.title: but they arrived quickly and I'm super happy with the quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: I was septical when ordering these stockings because of the low price, but they arrived quickly and I'm super happy with the quality and appearance. The size is that of a standard stocking.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Volker

customer_reviews.title: Great stockings
customer_reviews.text: Great stockings embroidered all my kids names and can use them over and over again. Came in as expected and they look great.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love them. These are nice and big and hold their shape once stuffed.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The cutest stockings ever! Quality is great and they were exactly what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These came super fast and were so cute!!!! Imthey stood up well to my heat press and I just love them!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, loved the patterns! Good price. Opening is slightly smaller than I imagined, but not bad. Stocking stuffers should be very small.

customer_reviews.title: Duration
customer_reviews.text: I love this and they were really cute once I got them monogrammed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Quality exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: These are far nicer then expected ! I applied my own htv vinyl and it adheres great. Very well put together especially for the cost !!!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are very pretty and are such a great price also !

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get them so I can design it I only use three but still worth buying it

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Deal!
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are perfect! Great size, great fabric weight and the faux fur trim is super soft.

customer_reviews.title: these are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are way cuter than I expected. For the price, these are awesome!

customer_reviews.title: I love these stockings
customer_reviews.text: I love these stockings! They were exactly what I wanted. I had our names monogrammed on them and they are PERFECT!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made! I can tell these will last a very long time!

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted them for. Good size and price.
customer_reviews.author: C McDonald

customer_reviews.title: These stockings are really cute as long as you don't ...
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are really cute as long as you don't put a lot of stuff in them. The fuller they get, the more out of shape they look but in a puckering kind of way. In my opinion, they're really more for decoration unlike the fabric ones which are made to fill.
customer_reviews.author: NatH

customer_reviews.title: ... on letters from the craft store and they look BEAUTIFUL. Only as a decoration—using for myself and my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought some green iron on letters from the craft store and they look BEAUTIFUL. Only as a decoration—using for myself and my pets—so not sure how sturdy they’d be if full. They are the material of a reusable bag from a grocery store. Great though; very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: ... in the mail and the quality is not as bad as I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these in the mail and the quality is not as bad as I was expecting. But I was disappointed when I opened my package and noticed I had to of the same stocking when I was expecting 4 different kinds. I would return but need them for St Nicks day next week 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ONLY RECEIVED ONE OF FOUR STOCKINGS, THEY WERE NOT BURLAP AS ADVERTISED.
customer_reviews.author: NINA BURUCA

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: They are nice and light. But they arrived with stains. And it is too late to get new ones before Christmas.... disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: LAETITIA MASCARIN

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal...depending on your taste
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are bright, durable, and a perfect size. The fabric is thin enough so that getting things in and out of the stocking is easy, but sturdy enough that it will not rip if you put something heavy in them. The opening and foot is wide and gives you plenty of room to put larger toys in the stocking. The only downside I can see is one of taste. They are very bright and not "traditional" x-mas colors, but I love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Zoetilda

customer_reviews.title: These are very cute
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for little stockings to put some treats in for our "granddogs" who are loved by my kids immensely. These are perfect. I had looked in some stores, and couldn't find anything I liked or when I did there weren't enough of them. So for the heck of it, I went into Amazon and found these! PERFECT! Next time, I'll go to Amazon first!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: They're perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much cuter in person. They look like they'll last for years to come. They're huge enough to put all kinds of goodies in. The burlap material is sturdy, the print is bright and durable, and the faux fur trim at the top is superbly soft. They were an excellent last minute "oh shoot, I'm 28 and I don't have a set of Xmas stockings for my own house" save-the-day purchase. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: ThePoptartFox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my parents and in-laws for their gifts this year. They’re a perfect size, they’re fairly durable (if not the best ever), and they’re cute. They’re *great* for the price. I think they’ll hold up nicely for a few good years of use with my family. They’d also be excellent decorative stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Householder

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I do stockings for my adult children every year and the stockings at the stores were boring. These bright stockings added a color punch to the tradition. These are big, sturdy stockings that held a great deal. They are reusable and washable. The price was the best, too.
customer_reviews.author: M Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! Received 2 of each design. They are very nice for the price. I hung them for decoration but didn't fill them. (I left the cardboard shaper inside.) They are sturdy enough to fill with candy or small items. They arrived quickly. Glad I chose these!
customer_reviews.author: WendyJo

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the Price
customer_reviews.text: These stocking are perfectly adequate for the price. I would in no way say they are fancy but they're also not super cheap looking, they look just fine hanging in my living room. I misplaced the box with our quilted stockings so these are temporary for this season and they will work out okay.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Lake Lisa

customer_reviews.title: would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the yellow, pink and teal set of 3. They're actually really adorable. For five bucks, heck yeah these were worth the money, I have NO complaints, they're fun and pretty cute.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. Not too big or too small. They are high quality and feel durable. Would definitely re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T

customer_reviews.title: Product not as pictured or described.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered specifically set of blue, yellow and rose colored burlap stockings and received 4 stockings all blue and red. Completely different product and pattern than ordered. Very thin and cheap and product doesn’t resemble anything close to what I ordered. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Ann and Dave Feist

customer_reviews.title: Fun patterns, bigger than average
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. They came folded and I assumed the creases would come out since they were hanging up but they didn’t. I may have to iron them out. Cute stockings though
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Different, quirky AND totally awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the weiner dog stocking for my daughter and ended up using all of them. They are different and quirky and totally awesome. Big and sturdy enough to hold plenty of goodies. Suspect these will be around a while too as they are made of good thick material.
customer_reviews.author: Venus11

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these, perfect size and the cuteness says it all, nice durable material.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Robinson

product_meta.title: HUAN XUN Personalized Christmas Stocking Custom Name - Burlap Stockings Fireplace Decor Large
product_meta.description:
Color:Personalized 1 Pcs - Normal Color - 1HUAN XUN Personalized Christmas Stocking Custom Name - Burlap Stockings Fireplace Decor Large 

Lovely Christmas stockings for Christmas this year to add more fun.
If you are going to hang up a sock to the fireplace, to use as wrapping for a gift, they are good choice.
1. The price is only for one stocking.
2. Made of burlap, there is a small area that we can personalize with names or we can add names or monograms on the top. See pictures for reference.
3. Please allow 3 days for production. 
4. Stockings are individually screen printed using heat transfers, not easy to fall off when washing, but can’t wash by brushes. 

Notes:
- Please allow slight deviation due to manual measurements.
- Hand washing with cold water, hang dry. 
If you have any questions or concerns please ask before ordering. WE DO NOT ACCEPT RETURN for custom items without quality problems.
feature_bullets: Personalized for Normal Color, Heat Transfers Print, Only 1 PCS
Buy 2 or more get 5% Discount at the cart for bussiness buyers
Cuff width 7.08", cuff to heal 15.35", heal to toe 11.4"
DO NOT ACCEPT RETURN for custom items without quality problems
Washing Instruction: Gentle hand wash separately in cold water only

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars303 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
